name: Machine Says
description:
It is a game for 4 players, it is about obeying what the screen tells you, if you do not obey it you lose, you are collecting points and so you can see who has won more times.

I made this game in 1 month with the support of a programmer who was helping me in certain things every time I was horribly stuck, I did it because many times I didn't have to play with my friends, and at least a simple game that would take us out of Some trouble would do something.
Thanks for playing.

To play two players you need at least one numeric keypad, the numbers that are on the right side.

To play with 3 or 4 players you need controls.

The recommended resolution to play is 1280x720
